name: Jackie Chan Adventures - Legend of the Dark Hand [GBA]
description:
The chinese triads are back at it again, only now this time they've manage to open a time portal! Help Jackie rescue his uncle fighting a wide variety of enemies in different history timelines so he can get back to his convenience store back in Chinatown. Karate chop!

Instructions:

WASD to move.

J KEY to kick.

K KEY to punch.

SPACE KEY to jump.

ENTER to Start.

Credits:

All sprites were made by me.

The music & SFX files were taken from opengameart.org, the list is the following:

- Wyver9 - Arcade Title

- Wyver9 - Fast Level

- PlayOnLoop - Nintendo Style - Upbeat Music Loop 2

- SubspaceAudio - The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection - 512 Sound Effects (8-bit style)
